content.html: i was born in the last century (20th) and i often work with people born in this century (21st). most children born today are likely to live into the next century (22nd). the work we all do today will affect the people of the 22nd century. think about that. #TheFutureIsNow
content.value:
i was born in the last century (20th) and i often work with people born in this century (21st). 

most children born today are likely to live into the next century (22nd).

the work we all do today will affect the people of the 22nd century.  

think about that.

#TheFutureIsNow

photo.alt: two hands, reaching toward the sun, holding a piece of wood carved in the shape of the word "FUTURE"
